verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Where two or more
Are gathered in His name
He is there
For all who come
Who run to Him in faith
He is there

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No fear, no lie
Can stand against us now
He is here
The Word has come
To silence every doubt
He is here

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
One name, one name can save
One name breaks every chain
One name, always
One name, Jesus
One name, one name remains
One name, we will proclaim
One name, always
One name

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power, power in His name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's power in His name
There's power in His name
